show1.name: Sword Swallower
show1.description: Our suave group of sword swallowers are sworn to swallow any sword swiftly for your audiences viewing pleasure!

show2.name: Joust
show2.description: Our jousting events are sure to enrapture any adoring medieval fan, peasant and royalty alike!

show3.name: Glass Blowing
show3.description: spend all day with our crafty glass blower as they conjure up many mystical and exciting glass goods and gizmos!
